text:
Onu Technology, Inc. | Deep learning and image processing

CONSULTING, GRADUATE/POSTDOCTORAL INTERN, or FULL-TIME

ONSITE (Silicon Valley) or REMOTE

We are developing high-performance algorithms for truly big data and image processing. At the moment, we're primarily interested in people who have solid experience with deep learning, including recurrent neural networks. You will have the chance to work on interesting problems with a great team. Postdoctoral scholars are welcome.

Contact info@onutechnology.com.
